org.monome.pages
Class AbletonClipLauncherPage

java.lang.Object
  org.monome.pages.AbletonClipLauncherPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Page
public class AbletonClipLauncherPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, Page

The Ableton Clip Launcher page. Usage information is available at: http://code.google.com/p/monome-pages/wiki/AbletonClipLauncherPage

Author:
Tom Dinchak

Field Summary
private  boolean[][] clipState
          clipState[track_number][clip number] - The current state of all clips in Ableton, true if the clip is playing.

          Reference to the MonomeConfiguration this page belongs to.

private  boolean[] tracksArmed
          tracksArmed[track_number] - The record armed/disarmed state of all tracks, true if the track is armed for recording.
private  AbletonClipUpdater updater
          A background thread process that updates clipState and tracksArmed based on information sent back by LiveOSC.
